Types

AndroidMidiSynthesizer
Link copied to clipboard
class AndroidMidiSynthesizer : MidiSynthesizer

Android implementation of MidiSynthesizer using FluidSynth via JNI. Converts MIDI files to audio using SoundFont files (.sf2 and .sf3).

IosMidiSynthesizer
Link copied to clipboard
class IosMidiSynthesizer : MidiSynthesizer

iOS implementation of MidiSynthesizer using FluidSynth via cinterop. Converts MIDI files to audio using SoundFont files (.sf2 and .sf3).

MidiSynthesizer
Link copied to clipboard
interface MidiSynthesizer

MIDI synthesizer for converting MIDI to audio using SoundFont files.

fun MidiSynthesizer.synthesizeFromNotes(fileSystem: FileSystem, outputPath: String, notes: List<MidiNote>, soundFontPath: String, sampleRate: Int = 44100, tempMidiPath: String? = null): Boolean
